mapper.select: SELECT no, contentid, title, address, image1, hit FROM busantravel WHERE contenttype = #{contenttype} ORDER BY no OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY
SELECT no, contentid, title, address, image1, hit, contenttype FROM busantravel WHERE address LIKE '%' || #{address} || '%' ORDER BY no OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / 12) FROM busantravel WHERE address LIKE '%' || #{address} || '%'

SELECT no, contentid, title, address, image1, hit, usetime, restdate, parking FROM (SELECT b.no, b.contentid, title, address, image1, hit, usetime, restdate, parking FROM busantravel b, attraction a WHERE b.contentid = a.contentid ORDER BY hit DESC) WHERE rownum <= 4
